page.title: 17COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES.
page.content: In Michaelchurch one activity has gone on since the{Queen's Jubilee. } This is a{Sports Day,}held in the field next to the school where the villages of Michaelchurch, Craswall and Newton St.Margarets compete against each other for a shield.There are all kinds of other games, a fancy dress competition, decorated floats and refreshments. About 4 years ago an{annual carol } {service}was started.Each Christmas Eve the village turns out behind the Post Office in Michaelchurch to sing carols and to feast on cider and mince pies. Father Christmas also comes bringing presents for all the children. In the absence of a village hall the school is used as a{community } {centre}where the people hold disco's, whist drives, coffee evenings and barbecues.
